TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NamedPipeClientStream extends System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream
Public NotInheritable Class NamedPipeClientStream Inherits PipeStream
public ref class NamedPipeClientStream sealed : System::IO::Pipes::PipeStream

summary.span: 暴露命名管道周围的 ，该管道既支持同步读写操作，也支持异步读写操作。

span.span: Exposes a around a named pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名的管道提供单向或双工管道的管道服务器与一个或多个管道客户端之间的通信。Named pipes provide one-way or duplex pipes for communication between a pipe server and one or more pipe clients. 本地或网络，可以进行进程间通信使用命名的管道。Named pipes can be used for interprocess communication locally or over a network. 可由多个共享单个管道名称对象。A single pipe name can be shared by multiple objects. 任何进程可以充当命名的管道服务器和/或客户端。Any process can act as either a named pipe server or client, or both. > [!NOTE] > 有关[!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)]，最多 10 个管道可以通过网络同时连接。For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一种方法将字符串从父进程发送到同一计算机上使用命名管道的子进程。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process on the same computer using named pipes. 此示例将创建父进程中的对象。This example creates a object in a parent process. 对象具有的值。The object has a value of . 然后等待服务器中用于连接到它的子进程的对象。The server then waits for a object in a child process to connect to it. 在此示例中，这两个进程都位于同一台计算机上并对象具有的值。In this example, both processes are on the same computer and the object has a value of . 接下来，父进程将用户提供的字符串发送给子进程。The parent process then sends a user-supplied string to the child process. 该字符串显示到控制台。The string is displayed to the console. 此示例适用于客户端过程中，连接到服务器进程。This example is for the client process, which connects to the server process. 整个代码示例中，包括代码管道客户端和服务器，请参阅[如何： 使用命名管道进行网络进程间通信](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md)。For the entire code sample, including the code for both the pipe client and server, see [How to: Use Named Pipes for Network Interprocess Communication](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md). [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数的管道方向由`desiredAccessRights`参数。The pipe direction for this constructor is determined by the `desiredAccessRights` parameter. 如果`desiredAccessRights`值是，将管道方向。If the `desiredAccessRights` value is , the pipe direction will be . 如果的值`desiredAccessRights`是，将管道方向。If the value of `desiredAccessRights` is , the pipe direction will be . 如果的值`desiredAccessRights`包括这两个并，将管道方向。If the value of `desiredAccessRights` includes both and , the pipe direction will be .

summary.span: 连接到具有无限超时值的等待的服务器。

span.span: Connects to a waiting server with an infinite time-out value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用无限期超时值的方法。This method calls the method with an infinite time-out value. 此方法等待管道实例变得可用。This method waits for a pipe instance to become available. 可能会返回前从调用对象，但不会返回直到已返回。 might return before is called from the object, but will not return until has returned. 写入到管道后的任何数据对象已连接，但在该服务器具有调用之前，将可供服务器对调用。Any data written to the pipe after a object has connected, but before the server has called , will be available to the server following the call to . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将字符串从父进程发送到子进程，使用命名管道的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to send a string from a parent process to a child process using named pipes. 此示例将创建子进程，然后连接到本地计算机上的一个管道中的对象。This example creates a object in a child process, which then connects to a pipe on the local computer. 服务器示例所示类。The server example can be seen in the class. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供和类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the and classes. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

span.span: The client is already connected.

summary.span: 在指定的超时期间内连接到等待的服务器。

span.span: Connects to a waiting server within the specified time-out period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等待管道实例变得可用。This method waits for a pipe instance to become available. 可能会返回前从调用，但不会返回直到已返回。 might return before is called from the , but will not return until has returned. 您设置`timeout`参数指定无限超时值。You set the `timeout` parameter to to specify an infinite time-out value. 写入到管道后的任何数据对象已连接，但在该服务器具有调用之前，将可供服务器对调用。Any data written to the pipe after a object has connected, but before the server has called , will be available to the server following the call to .

exception.span: 未能在指定的 时期内连接到服务器。

span.span: Could not connect to the server within the specified period.
is less than 0 and not set to .
The client is already connected.

exception.span: 服务器连接至其他客户端并且超时期间已过期。

span.span: The server is connected to another client and the time-out period has expired.

summary.span: 获取共享同一管道名称的服务器实例的数量。

span.span: Gets the number of server instances that share the same pipe name.

value.span: 共享同一管道名称的服务器实例的数量。

span.span: The number of server instances that share the same pipe name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的服务器实例的数目对象的当前对象具有的句柄或连接到。This property returns the number of server instances for the object that the current object has a handle to or is connected to. 如果当前对象尚未连接到命名的管道服务器，或如果尚未设置当前的管道句柄，此属性将引发。If the current object has not yet connected to a named pipe server, or if the current pipe handle has not yet been set, this property throws an . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将字符串从父进程发送到子进程，使用命名管道的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to send a string from a parent process to a child process using named pipes. 在此示例中，在子进程，然后连接到本地计算机上的一个管道中创建对象。In this example, a object is created in a child process, which then connects to a pipe on the local computer. 服务器示例所示类。The server example can be seen in the class. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供和类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the and classes. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]
